data.title: Needs work
data.text: Ordered a simple sandwich and it was sub par. Bread tasted old and pliable, marinara was more like tomato paste than sauce, cheese was coated with garlic powder and meatballs were bland at best. I was less than impressed.  It is a newer location, I think they need some time to get it together. When they get their game down they could be a staple in the neighborhood.

data.title: A perfect find!
data.text:
I stopped in today to get gas and thought, "okay, i'll give this hole in the wall a shot, let's see what kind of pizza they make". 

I was greeted with such enthusiasm and appreciation from the young people - it made me happy. 
Then I got home and tried the pizza; cheese and pepperoni- awesome! Look out Bruno's (my favorite) this one is large, tasty and a great location from my drive home. 

Aka-chaching

data.title: lunch slice
data.text: The pizza is good but first impressions are very important!!! It looks like they were not ready to open.  They need to organize the place hide the boxes and cups, need a glass shield for the pizza display. I think they will do good if they can make the place look presentable.

data.title: Save Your Money
data.text: We tried 2 types of pizza and a sandwich. All I can say is bland, bland and dry! The cashier took our money, then without washing his ungloved hand, put shredded cheese on a pizza. Needless to say I will not be eating there again.
